participant_1.name: Jordan Miller
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and practical, I approach life with a can-do attitude. I enjoy sharing my knowledge of survival skills with others.
participant_1.background: my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living. i'm an avid kayaker. i'm also a graduate student.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Energetic and passionate about health, I love to stay active and share my enthusiasm for sports with friends.
participant_2.background: i enjoy sports such as running. i am a woman. i am a vegetarian. my favorite color is blue.

content.text: are you a woman or a man?
